CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed - Non-pecuniary damage - award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in FAC , the GPE region . He is a former employee of the ORG “ ElectronGaz ” ( “ the ORG , ” ORG “ Електрон-Газ ” ) . At the material time the ORG owned PERCENT of the ORG 's share capital . The ORG was therefore subject to the PERSON of DATE “ on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property . ”

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Жовтоводський міський суд ORG області ) ordered the Company to pay the applicant ORG ORG in salary arrears . This judgment became final and the enforcement writ was transferred to ORG ( “ the Bailiffs , ” PERSON виконавчої служби Жовтоводського міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Bailiffs informed the applicant that the enforcement of the judgment of DATE was delayed on account of the ORG 's lack of funds . It also stated that the attachment of the ORG 's property was impeded by the PERSON of DATE “ on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property . ”
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Господарський суд ORG області ) instituted bankruptcy proceedings against the ORG and on DATE ordered its rehabilitation to be completed by DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received the debt due to him by the judgment of DATE .
